name: unrespectable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not considered to be socially acceptable because of bad character, appearance, or behaviour: There was something glamorous and at the same time excitingly unrespectable about groups of artists living together. Opposite
respectable
More examplesFewer examplesThey disseminate the philosophy that there is something vaguely unrespectable about enjoying yourself too much, about losing control.At his unrespectable and irreverent best, he had a knack for startling his audience, disconcerting his peers, even dismaying his admirers. Moral reformers were making ever clearer that distinction between respectable and unrespectable behaviour.
